body: I have lost interest playing Avicus, I don't find it fun anymore. So I have decided I am going to be leaving. Thank you for the good times everyone. 3+ years.<br id="null"><br id="null">I love y'all and have a nice day/night!<br id="null"><br id="null">If you need to contact me for whatever reason skype is DaMonster20<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">
